meta.title: Vinicius Meirelles | Portfolio
meta.description: Portfolio of a Full Stack Developer specializing in React.

home.name: Vinicius Meirelles
home.description: Software Developer with 3 years of hands-on experience in high-performance interfaces, focused on eliminating manual work and maximizing value through technology.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: With 3 years of experience, I specialize in building high-performance interfaces and data visualizations utilizing the React and TypeScript ecosystem.
about.paragraph2: At Embraer, the biggest aerospace company in Brazil, I contributed to the development of over 10 critical projects. A key highlight was my role in an award-winning automation solution (Top 13 out of 121 projects) which, through process re-engineering, reduced operational effort by 85%, generating direct savings and scalability for the business unit.
about.paragraph3: Today, I seek to create solutions that positively impact people's lives, merging technical performance with intuitive design.

items.title: Audio App
items.description: Full-featured headphone e-commerce with product search and shopping cart functionality.

accessibility.photo_description: Vinicius is smiling in the photo. He is a white man with short dark brown hair. He has a beard and mustache, and wears square glasses.
